### lowerIncomingArguments() {#a7b5e905120f338f7a41f50054d3ba22b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SjLjEHPrepareImpl::lowerIncomingArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
lowerIncomingArguments - To avoid having to handle incoming arguments specially, we lower each arg to a copy instruction in the entry block.

This ensures that the argument value itself cannot be live out of the entry block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/sjljehprepare-cpp/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/sjljehprepare-cpp">SjLjEHPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setupEntryBlockAndCallSites() {#a1a5acd85ddae98a8d488b66feb0a403a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SjLjEHPrepareImpl::setupEntryBlockAndCallSites (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
setupEntryBlockAndCallSites - Setup the entry block by creating and filling the function context and marking the call sites with the appropriate values.

These values are used by the DWARF EH emitter.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/sjljehprepare-cpp/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/sjljehprepare-cpp">SjLjEHPrepare.cpp</a>.
